titleStmt.title: A narrative of the siege of London-Derry, or, The late memorable transactions of that city faithfully represented to rectifie the mistakes and supply the omissions of Mr. Walker's account / by John Mackenzie ... ; the most material passages relating to other parts of Ulster and Sligo are also inserted from the memoirs of such as were chiefly concerned in them.
titleStmt.author: Mackenzie, John, 1648?-1696.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
